title: Mrs. Muggles Learns to Read
description: This story is about Mrs. Muggles and a young Metis girl named Willow. Mrs. Muggles and Willow love to read. Willow likes to buy fancy glasses for Mrs. Muggles to wear when she reads. Be sure to check out the quiz on the last page of the story showing all the cool, fancy glasses Mrs. Muggles and her friends wear. Balanced text and illustrations make this a good choice for a read-aloud story at the Early Years level. Children can identify with a special relationship between a child and their pet.
author: Penny Ross
